item.description:
What are you doing this afternoon? 

Join a few of us for lunch at my favorite cafe and bookstore on Newbury Street.

This is the perfect opportunity for you to come if you:

1. Want to organize your own Boston Volunteers events for your New Years Resolution

2.  Want to meet new people

3.  Are hungry

 

We'll be there roughly from 2:30-4:30, if you'd care to join us.

 

Because this cafe is very popular and because we often run out of seats, we can only host 8 people.


We anticipate enjoying lunch with you, :)
Phani, Josh and the Boston Volunteers
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess. I'll also provide my phone number for you.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Brunch with the Boston Volunteers
